p: The hydrazide molecules showed reduced activity in the enzyme inhibitory assay. Therefore, only the most sensitive cell line U266 was used for the test of hydrazide derivatives. As shown in Table 2, the hydrazide compounds did not exhibit improved antiproliferative activity than the corresponding molecules with hydroxamic acid ZBG. Among the hydrazide series, molecules with -propyl substituted R 2 showed good inhibitory potency. The IC 50 values of compound I1e2, I3e2, I10e2, and I13e2 were 0.64, 0.48, 0.74, and 0.71 μM, respectively, compared with SAHA (0.88 μM).
